summary: A 300-year-old witch terrorizes a college town to get revenge on the descendant of the man who persecuted her.
cast: Robert Elston|Anitra Walsh|Darryl Wells|Jack Gardner|Barbara Brownell|Marie Santell|Gary Brockette|Sande Drewes|Lawrence DuPont|John Figlmiller|Sylvia Rundell|Lori Taylor
title: Mark of the Witch
